p: In the study area, the model-simulated grassland NPP A shows an increasing trend over majority (69.7%) of the grassland in Xinjiang (Fig.Â 1a). Among them, 16.2% shows significant increase, mainly distributed along the edge of the Tarim Basin and southern margin of the Junggar Basin; 53.5% shows increase but not significant, mainly distributed in the Junggar and Tarim basins. About one third (30.3%) of grassland shows decreasing trend, including 10.7% as significant decrease, mainly distributed in the Ili river valley and the Altai mountains.
